issue.title: Fix Travis JDK9 build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1527](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1527). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems the jdk9 package is not present by default in the trusty image for travis CI.

comments.body:
